lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Minimal installation for basic AI codegen capabilities with core coordination agents
lite.useCase: Users wanting to try Claude Code with minimal footprint and essential workflow management
lite.targetUsers: Beginners, evaluators, users with limited system resources

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Balanced installation with all agents and essential document processing and design capabilities
standard.useCase: Professional development with comprehensive AI codegen plus core document creation and design skills

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Complete installation with all capabilities including advanced development, testing, and creative skills
pro.useCase: Full-featured installation for users needing all AI codegen, document processing, testing, debugging, and creative capabilities
pro.targetUsers: Power users, enterprises, teams requiring comprehensive feature set
